languages.text: Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.

traits.locale_text: Generally, companions' Convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.
Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.

languages.text: Companion convictions don't generally change from Rogue Trader actions and provide no specific benefits apart from equipment usage.

traits.locale_text: Companion convictions don't generally change from Rogue Trader actions and provide no specific benefits apart from equipment usage.

languages.text: Обычно убеждения компаньонов не зависят от действий Вольного Торговца и не предоставляют специальных преимуществ за исключением возможности использовать определенное снаряжение.
languages.original_text: Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.

traits.locale_text: Обычно Убеждения компаньонов не зависят от действий Вольного Торговца и не предоставляют специальных преимуществ за исключением возможности использовать определенное снаряжение.
Обычно Убеждения компаньонов не зависят от действий Вольного Торговца и не предоставляют специальных преимуществ за исключением возможности использовать определенное снаряжение.

languages.text: Por lo general, las convicciones de los compañeros no dependen de las acciones de tu Comerciante Independiente y no proporcionan beneficios más allá de la posibilidad de usar cierto equipo.
languages.original_text: Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.

languages.text: 一般的に、仲間の信念は自由開拓者の行動に左右されず、特定の装備品を仕様できる以外に特別なメリットはない。
languages.original_text: Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.

traits.locale_text: 一般的に、仲間の信念は自由開拓者の行動に左右されず、特定の装備品を仕様できる以外に特別なメリットはない。

languages.text: 通常而言，行商浪人的选择不会改变同伴的信念。同伴的信念除了能让同伴使用某些特定装备之外，不会提供其他好处。
languages.original_text: Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.

languages.text: Im Allgemeinen basieren die Überzeugungen von Gefährten nicht auf den Aktionen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und gewähren außer der Fähigkeit, bestimmtes Equipment zu benutzen, keine weiteren Vorteile.
languages.original_text: Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.

traits.locale_text: Im Allgemeinen basieren die Überzeugungen von Gefährten nicht auf den Aktionen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und gewähren außer der Fähigkeit, bestimmtes Equipment zu benutzen, keine weiteren Vorteile.

languages.text: De manière générale, les convictions des compagnons ne dépendent pas des actions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et n'apportent aucun avantage particulier, si ce n'est la possibilité d'utiliser certains équipements.
languages.original_text: Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.

traits.locale_text: De manière générale, les convictions des compagnons ne dépendent pas des actions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et n'apportent aucun avantage particulier, si ce n'est la possibilité d'utiliser certains équipements.

languages.text: Yoldaşların kanaatleri, çoğunlukla Hür Tacir'in eylemlerine bağlı değildir ve belirli bazı ekipmanları kullanabilmek dışında özel bir fayda sağlamazlar.
languages.original_text: Generally, companions' convictions do not depend on the Rogue Trader's actions and provide no specific benefits apart from the ability to use certain equipment.
